headline: After Deadly Knife Attack, Britain Vows to Harden Terrorism Sentences
abstract: Proposals include tougher jail sentences for terrorism convicts and more resources for counterterrorism police.
lead_paragraph: LONDON â€” The British government said on Tuesday that it would toughen terrorism sentences and end early release for serious offenders, following through on promises made by Prime Minister Boris Johnson in November after a convicted terrorist who had been automatically released carried out an attack that killed two people near London Bridge.
